original: intros D_open fn_cvu fn_cont x Dx. unfold continuity_pt. intros eps eps_pos. destruct (fn_cvu eps) as [N HN]. intros n y Dy. specialize (fn_cont n y Dy). unfold continue_in, no_cond in fn_cont.
